description: A PLANAR CAMPAIGN Consider Alignments: The core DUNGEONS & DRAGONS experi- The multiverse is a big place. Whether you’re starting a new ence focuses on the conflict between good and evil. The planes planar campaign from scratch or adding planar locations to an open up many more opportunities for this conflict or for its existing campaign, here are some tips to keep in mind. counterpart: the clash between chaos and law. In a planar
name: DM GUIDANCE

description: The planes can easily overwhelm players or DMs campaign, the DM might choose to make the chaos/law axis who want to try everything all at once. Don’t try to do too much the primary one. The multiverse feels very different when lawful too soon. good and lawful evil characters work together to stem the tides
name: Take it Slow

description: It’s your campaign, but the players and DM of chaos. work together to create the multiverse. The DM should set an View Each Plane as Unique: How different does each lo- overall tone for the campaign. Does an event on one plane have cation feel? The planes offer great opportunities to create cosmic importance that creates ripples through several others, unique atmospheres, and each plane should have its own or do the planes work very independently? mood. A visit to Celestia and a visit to the Abyss should share As an example, the PLANESCAPE Campaign Setting (published little in common. several years ago) adopted a very specific tone where all that is The DM is largely responsible for establishing the atmo- interesting happens in threes. Most adventures revolved around sphere of each location, but players can help by being open the city of Sigil (either as a staring point or where the action to the unexpected instead of supposing each place to be like takes place). It had a specific lingo, the Cant, which helped make every other. Sigil feel unique. Not every locale has an inn at which adventurers of all races
name: Decide on a Tone

description: A DM should feel free to restrict the gather to drink ale, socialize, and meet the shady contact for scope of “known territory” and gradually bring in new places as their next adventure. Most places on the Inner Planes lack the campaign grows. inns and accommodations for travelers. Watering holes on the
name: One Place at a Time

The harbor allows The most famous planar metropolis of all is the city of Sigil. traders access to the city’s canal system.
